channel.title: midnight solarium
channel.description: a website dedicated to all organisms, formations, and concepts that grow in the night

item.guid: slight layout tweaks and also some moths
item.description: tweaked layout to require less divs and look a bit less visually cluttered, made a new button, wrote more ruminations, wrote a brief weblog about a graphics resource i found

item.guid: stackoverflow did not come through for me so i had to write my own javascript for once
item.description: created chaos garden (meant to be a hub for misc. webpages that don't fit anywhere else), made ruminations page, tweaked rss so hopefully it'll show up on nekoweb's built-in feed, tweaked layout to be a bit friendlier to smaller and medium-sized screens

item.guid: is this how you make an RSS feed?
item.description: finally slapped together an RSS feed (which you are reading right now! assuming i did it right!), retroactively added lazyloading to some image-heavy pages, added new slippers to craft catalog, added more notes to notebook, added one easter egg (good luck!)
